name: PostgresChat
tagline: All PostgreSQL-related chats in one place
body:
English
---
* https://postgres-slack.herokuapp.com/ (Slack)
* https://gitter.im/postgresmen/postgresql (Gitter, Github login is needed)
* irc://irc.freenode.net/postgresql (IRC, old school)
* http://telegram.me/PostgresChat (Telegram)

Русский (Russian)
---
* https://gitter.im/postgresmen/postgresqlrussia (Gitter, вход с помощью Github-аккаунта)
* https://goo.gl/b0bQs6 (Telegram)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
